name: Ticket & Check-in Rate
query:
SELECT
 e.event_name AS event,
 COUNT(r.name) AS registered,
 SUM(CASE WHEN c.name IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS checked_in,
 (SUM(CASE WHEN c.name IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/ COUNT(r.name)) * 100 AS check_in_rate
FROM `tabMain Event` e
LEFT JOIN `tabEvent Ticket` r ON r.event = e.name
LEFT JOIN `tabEvent Check-in` c ON c.event_ticket = r.name
GROUP BY e.name
